name: Joey's Adventures
description:
Joey works at a bank. Don't get me wrong, he loves his job but he always
had the feeling that something is missing in his life.

Every night Joey dreams about how he would be as a world traveler, in search
of big adventures and that extra spice for his life.

What is Joey going to be in his dream tonight? A ferocious pirate? A fearless jet pilot?
Or maybe the famous treasure hunter?
Let's see...

Can you solve the ancient puzzles untill your torch runs out?

Game was created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare #36. And we are currently working on further development of the game.

Graphics: @Dominik_Luska

Sfx and audio: @Emanuel_Hihn

Coding, putting things together: @26MaTo26
